title: Shadowrun: Hong Kong - Extended Edition [v.3.1.0] [R.G. Freedom]
description:
Year: 2015
Genre: Adventure, Indi, RPG, Strategy
Developer: Harebrained Schemes
Publisher: Harebrained Holdings
Interface language: English
Voice language: -
Game version: 3.1.0
Publication type: RePack
Tablet: not required (DRM-FRee by GOG)


System requirements:


OS: Windows XP SP3/Vista/Windows 7 & 8
Processor: x86-compatible 1.8GHz or faster processor
RAM: 2 GB RAM
Video: DirectX compatible 3D graphics card with at least 256MB of addressable memory
DirectX: 9.0c
Free space on hard drive: 11 Gb


Description:


Shadowrun: Hong Kong - Extended Edition is the capstone title in Harebrained Schemes' Shadowrun series - and now includes the all-new, 6+ hr Shadows of Hong Kong Bonus Campaign. Experience the most impressive Shadowrun RPG yet, hailed as one of the best cRPG / strategy games of 2015!


Features repack:
1. Do not cut;
2. Do not recoded;
3. This release contains the following DLCs:
- Shadows of Hong Kong (Bonus!);
- Core Shadowrun Returns functionality.
4. Tested on Win 7 (x64);
5. RePack by R.G. Freedom
